subject: Baseball
World Series
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Detroit practiced this week with a resolve not to repeat its postseason in 2006, when the Tigers sat idle for six days after sweeping Oakland in the A.L.C.S. and then fell flat in the World Series.
snippet: Detroit practiced this week with a resolve not to repeat its postseason in 2006, when the Tigers sat idle for six days after sweeping Oakland in the A.L.C.S. and then fell flat in the World Series.
